message.content:
cs.CR, cs.SE, cs.PL, cs.SI, cs.DS

The paper discusses the issue of repackaged Android apps, which is a security concern, indicating that it could belong to the cs.CR (Cryptography and Security) sub-category. The paper also discusses the challenges and current solutions for detecting repackaged apps, which could fall under the cs.SE (Software Engineering) sub-category. Additionally, the paper proposes a large dataset to support replications of existing solutions and implications of new research directions, which could be relevant to the cs.PL (Programming Languages) sub-category. The paper also discusses the need for innovative approaches beyond the current state-of-the-art, which could be relevant to the cs.SI (Social and Information Networks) sub-category. Finally, the paper discusses the research around this specific issue, which could be relevant to the cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms) sub-category.
